Event.Message: Failed to set the RDP policies: %1
RDP Session was disconnected: Reason = %1, Extended = %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Reason" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> <data name="ExtReason" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> </template>

Event.Message: The container logon operation has been completed
Attempted Copy/Paste from WDAG has been blocked by policy
A Failure has occurred: HResult = %1, File = %2, LineNumber = %3, Function = %4, Message = %5, CallingContext = %6, Module = %7, Code = %8
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HResult" inType="win:Int32" outType="win:Hresult"/> <data name="File" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="LineNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Function" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Message" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="CallContext" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Module" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Code" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:Int32" outType="win:Hresult"/> <data name="Container Id" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Message" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Informational Event: Message = %5, HResult = %1, ContainerId = %2, ProgramId = %3, Arguments = %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:Int32" outType="win:Hresult"/> <data name="Container Id" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="AppId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Arguments" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Message" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: A WDAG Error Dialogue has been shown: ContainerId = %1, ProgramType = %2, Container Error = %3, Container Error Extended = %4, RdpError = %5, Rdp Error Extended = %6, Location = %7
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ContainerId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ProgramType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="LastOperationResult" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NotificationType" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> <data name="RdpError" inType="win:Int32" outType="win:Hresult"/> <data name="RdpErrorExt" inType="win:Int32" outType="win:Hresult"/> <data name="RdpNotificationEvent" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> </template>
